title: Kavanaugh book authors: 2020 Democrats had a 'rush to judgment' on impeachment after NYT op-ed
text: New York Times reporters Robin Pogrebin and Kate Kelly join Michael Isikoff and Daniel Klaidman on the Yahoo News podcast "Skullduggery." The guests' newly released book, "The Education of Brett Kavanaugh," has created controversy by bringing forth a previously unreported allegation against the newest Supreme Court justice. This in turn has prompted several Democratic candidates to call for his impeachment. Isikoff and Klaidman challenge Pogrebin and Kelly to explore in a deeper way the ongoing Kavanaugh saga.
